channel.title: Id Software on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Id Software on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Fall Of Voodoo
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Today’s startup companies seem to have a certain arc to them—they get some seed funding, they launch, they draw some interest for their good idea, they keep growing, and maybe they become a part of the fabric of our lives … or a part of the fabric of a significantly larger company. Strangely, 3Dfx didn’t so much draw interest as blow the lid off of a trend that redefined how we think of video games.
